'''Once Upon a Time...''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Stone Harbor's Nostalgia: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to finish listening to the tale of [[The Wrath of Haishan]] in "[[Cliffhanger]]."
